summary: FAULTY DRIVER'S SIDE DOOR LATCH WILL NOT OPEN FROM THE INSIDE.  THE VEHICLE WAS PARKED.  AFTER CLIMBING OUT THE PASSENGER SIDE DOOR AND WALKING AROUND THE CAR THE DRIVER'S DOOR DID OPEN FROM THE OUTSIDE.  FORD LISTS A RECALL FOR 2013-2014 FUSION, BUT NOT EARLIER YEARS.  AN INTERNET SEARCH SHOWS I AM NOT THE ONLY 2011 OWNER WITH THIS SAFETY ISSUE.
